body.name: Pipishell Advanced Tilt TV Wall Mount, Wall Mount TV Bracket for Most 42–90 inch TVs up to 132 lbs, 15° Full Tilt, 6-inch Arm Extension, Slide to Center, Max VESA 600x400mm, 16″/24″ Wood Studs, PIAT3
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 18 mins
features: Compatible with Extra-Large TVs: The Pipishell advanced tilting TV wall mount is designed to hold most 42″–90″ TVs up to 132 lbs with VESA mounting patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. Please verify the screen size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase.

Enjoy 15° Full Tilt: This wall mount TV bracket features a full 15° tilt range that can be easily adjusted without tools. Simply loosen the tilt knobs, adjust the tilt angle, then tighten the knobs to secure the screen. The pull cord locking mechanisms allow you to lock or release the TV quickly and easily.

6-inch Arm Extension: The unique articulating arms of this 85 inch TV wall mount extend out up to 6 inches for easier access to the power outlet and TV connections. Slightly swivel the TV by +/-8° to direct the screen toward you or to help reduce glare. When retracted, the tilt TV mount profile is only 2.91″ in depth.

Easy TV Centering: The advanced tilt TV wall mount 85 inch is designed with a wider wall plate that fits 16″ to 24″ wood studs, making it easier to position the wall mount TV bracket in your room. TVs with VESA width up to 500mm can be moved left or right to achieve perfect TV centering.

Hassle-Free Installation: The tilting TV wall mount 75 inch includes a drilling template and standard mounting hardware for hassle-free installation. Mount on wood studs, solid concrete, or brick walls. Please note that this wall mount TV bracket is not compatible with drywall-only installation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Advanced Tilt TV Wall Mount | Enjoy Easier Access to TV Connections

The PIAT3 TV wall mount bracket features 15° full tilt functionality and +/-8° screen swivel to provide the optimal viewing angle for your room. Easily adjust the tilt angle without the need for tools, simply by loosening the tilt knobs and then retightening to secure the desired angle.
Previous page Next page 1 Purchase Tips 2 Fits TVs Size & Max Load 3 Compatiable TV Vase Range 4 Installation Notes

The Pipishell TV wall mount 85 inch is the perfect solution for living rooms, home theaters, classrooms, and bedrooms. The 86 inch tv wall mount can bring enhanced viewing into your space while also helping to streamline any room.

Our TV wall mount 85 inch prioritizes stability above all with anti-drop edges and a wider wall plate for ultimate security. The X-shaped extendable arms offer flexibility and strength for TVs up to 90″ and 132 lbs, giving you the ability to upgrade your screen from medium to large down the line.

The Pipishell TV wall mount 75 inch is the perfect solution for living rooms, home theaters, classrooms, and bedrooms. The 85 inch tv wall mount can bring enhanced viewing into your space while also helping to streamline any room.
Living Room Class Room Home Theater

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A complete and well-designed large screen wall mounting system.
reviews.reviewText: I had a smaller capacity TV wall mount unit similar to this new Pipishell Advanced Tilt Mount. I needed to upgrade for the larger TV purchased over Christmas. I realized I desired the option to tilt the screen for optimal viewing, since the old mount couldn't. I also did not like how the old one required long Philips screwdriver to access the security-safety bolts in order to mount and remove the TV from the wall.The addition of lock release pull tabs for the Pipishell mount made moving the TV and aligning it less of a task. Each person reaches down and pull and the TV releases and it can be lifted off. Simple!All the materials are high quality, fit and finish very good. And all necessary hardware to hang the mount is included. Everything is provided to install the mount properly, even a small carpenter's level. You just need your drill and drivers.Just locate the studs in the wall, secure to them and then bolt the VESA mounting arms to the TV. And you are ready to hang your big TV securely.The built-in tilt is just enough to aim the TV the couple degrees left or right and down to get the viewing angle right for your seating.This unit provides all the features I need and I'm very happy with my purchase. Satisfaction!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this tv mount is a huge step up from my previous stationary mount. the tv mount I'd been using forever didn't move at all. and my couch is positioned in such a way that the tv was kind of oddly off to the side a little and wasn't an ideal viewing angle. and neither was the viewing angle from the kitchen table. then I found this tv mount which not only tilts down, but can be angled right or left a certain degree. holy cow, this has completely changed the way I watch tv. when I'm sitting on the couch I angle it towards the couch and it is the PERFECT angle. when I'm sitting at the table on the other side of the room I can angle it the other direction and again, PERFECT angle. and it's so easy to adjust it. the whole thing is also super sturdy. my dad put it up on the wall and used his own anchors and this thing is not going anywhere. I'm so, so, so, so, so happy with this tv mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor design, difficult to level
reviews.reviewText: The wall bracket is 3 piece which you have to self assemble, but has insufficient alignment features which means the two sides don’t align, so near impossible to maintain a level tv with no other adjusting features to overcome this. Would not recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Missing the Game This Week
reviews.reviewText: Had to be in the shop last weekend and wasn't able to watch my team in the playoffs - Not going to happen tomorrow.The Pipishell Tilt TV Wall Mount arrived yesterday afternoon - put her up today The install was super easy. The mount comes with a library of instructions, but they're not needed. Once you look at this the install process is very intuitive. The cardboard vessel it arrived in is smaller than I imagined it would be, and that is because the mounting base that screws to the wall comes in 3 pieces ( two wings and a center plate) - See Photo. Just put them together and twist two nuts on the bolts that are already attached to one of the wings. They even include a wrench with correct socket so you don't have to go digging through your tool bag. Once assembled screw her into studs on wall, fasten the arms to TV with included machine screws, and hang her up. There are a couple spring latches that also need to be latched to the bottom lip on the frame - easy - not worth explaining. Also it is very easy to tilt and swivel - mine is doing both.5 Stars for The Pipishell Advanced Tilt TV Wall Mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy TV mount
reviews.reviewText: The Pipishell Advanced Tilt TV Wall Mount is a great TV mount.It comes with great instructions! Find the studs in the wall, use the installation diagram to hang on the wall to drill the holes, and follow the instructions for the easiest installation. I always get nervous with wall mounts because you are basically putting your trust in something to hold one of the most expensive items in your home! This mount is AMAZING! It feels very sturdy and holds our TV perfectly. It tilts nicely into the positions that we want and still feels very sturdy on the wall. Very pleased with this mount!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Glad to have tv off the wall
reviews.reviewText: I chose this one because it seemed very sturdy and I was right. The tv is up and looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent wall mount for larger TVs
reviews.reviewText: I've lost count of how many TVs I've mounted to walls and how many different types of mounts I've used, but this is definitely one of the best. The instructions were very clear, all of the required components were included, and installation was especially simple thanks to the included template. This was the first mount I've used that came with a template, and it's significantly easier to mark hole locations when you're holding a piece of paper compared to holding up the actual mount. The 65" TV that it is holding up feels secure and can easily be tilted/moved as desired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super secure, trust my tv on it
reviews.reviewText: Mount came very quickly. We hung it up and hung off it, that was about 400 lbs, just to test before we put the tv up. Easily adjustable, slides left and right fantastically. Love that the kit included an installation diagram to hang on the wall to drill the holes.Tv is 75”.
